# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $100 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
